body.p: The following playbooks are used to deploy Splunk.

ul.li: playbooks/splunk_demo.yml installs a demo of Splunk Enterprise in the cluster (if the splunk_demo deployment option is selected. A value of splunk is used to configure an external production Splunk deployment.)
playbooks/splunk_uf.yml installs and configures the Splunk Universal Forwarder on each Linux and Windows machine in the inventory
